item.title: Bulls start 5-0 for 1st time since 90s Jordan era
item.description: The Bulls are the lone undefeated team remaining in the Eastern Conference, improving to 5-0 for the first time since the 1996-97 season with a 135-12...

item.title: NCAA to allow JSU to hire ex-Vol Pruitt as analyst
item.description: The NCAA informed Jacksonville State it could hire former Tennessee coach Jeremy Pruitt as an analyst, the school announced on Friday.

item.title: Yamamoto, bullpen repel Jays to force Game 7

item.title: Belichick on first ACC win with UNC: 'Feels great'
item.description: Bill Belichick won his first Atlantic Coast Conference game when North Carolina came from behind to defeat Syracuse 27-10.
